author: Staff Reporter
text:
In association with Centre for Social Leadership, USA, Sevalaya inaugurated a three-day NGO leadership summit - Balancing Heart Head and Hand – at the Anna University alumni centre on Wednesday.

V. Ponraj, scientific advisor to (Late) Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam inaugurated the summit. Anthony Silard, president, Centre for Social Leadership, USA and CEO of The Global Leadership Institute will hold the sessions. The summit will focus on characteristics of an effective NGO leader, networking and finding a work-life balance. “This summit comes in wake of fresh challenges faced by NGOs under the new CSR law,” said V. Muralidharan, founder & managing trustee, Sevalaya. —staff reporter

The summit will focus on effective NGO leadership and finding work-life balance
title: NGO leadership summit under way
